DEPT_CODE: The code representing the department. DataType: varchar
DEPT_NAME: The name of the department. DataType: varchar
SCHOOL_CODE: The code representing the school to which the department belongs. DataType: varchar
EMP_NUM: The number of employees in the department. DataType: int
DEPT_ADDRESS: The address of the department. DataType: varchar
DEPT_EXTENSION: The extension number of the department. DataType: int
table_explanation: This table contains information about different departments. It includes the department code, department name, school code, number of employees, department address, and department extension.
